channel.title: Softlayer_network_component_uplink_hardware on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_component_uplink_hardware on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Uplink_Hardware
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Uplink_Hardware Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_Uplink_Hardware data type abstracts information related to network connections between SoftLayer hardware and SoftLayer network components. It is populated via triggers on the network_connection table (SoftLayer_Network_Connection), so you shouldn’t have to delete or insert records into this table, ever. seeAlso SoftLayer_Hardware SoftLayer_Network_Component Local Relational hardware A network component uplink's connected [[SoftLayer_Hardware|Hardware]]. Type: SoftLayer_Hardware

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Uplink_Hardware
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Uplink_Hardware Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_Uplink_Hardware data type abstracts information related to network connections between SoftLayer hardware and SoftLayer network components. It is populated via triggers on the network_connection table (SoftLayer_Network_Connection), so you shouldn’t have to delete or insert records into this table, ever. Local Relational hardware A network component uplink's connected [[SoftLayer_Hardware|Hardware]]. Type: SoftLayer_Hardware networkComponent The [[SoftLayer_Network_Component|Network Component]] that a uplink connection belongs to.
